structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.catch_line: Allocation of funds appropriated to counties.
law.text: The Department for Local Government shall allocate the sum appropriated by the General Assembly from the funds arising under the provisions of KRS 177.320(2), for the construction, reconstruction, improvement, and maintenance of county roads and bridges in accordance with the provisions of KRS 177.360(1).
